Import an offer file from an external source.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the import_offer endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Import an offer","required":["offer"],"properties":{"offer":{"type":"string","description":"Offer string to import"}},"title":"ImportOffer"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from import_offer","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with imported offer ID","required":["offer_id"],"properties":{"offer_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the imported offer"}},"title":"ImportOfferResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
